attributes.action: hold a referendum on any new treaty with the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that Blair's statement that a referendum is not required for the new EU treaty he is contemplating is a negation of the rights of the British Citizens as its intention is to bring in a constitution by the back door.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
